metadata.Title: CVE-2023-32360 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An authentication issue was addressed with improved state management. This issue is fixed in macOS Big Sur 11.7.7, macOS Monterey 12.6.6, macOS Ventura 13.4. An unauthenticated user may be able to access recently printed documents.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-32360` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cups - 2.4.2-3ubuntu2.4
cups-bsd - 2.4.2-3ubuntu2.4
cups-client - 2.4.2-3ubuntu2.4
cups-common - 2.4.2-3ubuntu2.4
cups-core-drivers - 2.4.2-3ubuntu2.4
cups-daemon - 2.4.2-3ubuntu2.4
cups-ipp-utils - 2.4.2-3ubuntu2.4
cups-ppdc - 2.4.2-3ubuntu2.4
cups-server-common - 2.4.2-3ubuntu2.4
libcups2 - 2.4.2-3ubuntu2.4
libcupsimage2 - 2.4.2-3ubuntu2.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cups package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.2-3ubuntu2.4').
